actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIV of the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal grants for small public water systems to meet national primary drinking water regulations.
short_title: Rural Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act

summary.text: Rural Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to small public water systems for the purpose of enabling such systems to meet national primary drinking water regulations.

titles.title: Rural Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act
A bill to amend title XIV of the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal grants for small public water systems to meet national primary drinking water regulations.
